channel.title: Paul and Andrea Fries on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Paul and Andrea Fries on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2019
item.description: Church. I baptized Ashley and Dillan! Praise God! How awesome is that‽ We took Kathy Mitchell and Paul and Andrea Fries to El Ranchero for lunch, we all had a great time! Fantastic Sams for kid haircuts. Bought Lesa bedroom suite/mattress at Living Room Center. Truck overheating.

item.title: Status Update – July 17, 2019
item.description: Lesa and Dwyane’s birthday! Dwyane 7, Lesa add 50. Lesa PTO, I worked, daycare. Lesa cleaned house, prepped for birthday party, I had to work until 6pm! Paul and Andrea came over, ate dinner, gave birthday boy and girl gifts, visited awhile and went home, it was nice. Watched TV.

item.title: Status Update – June 30, 2019
item.description: Church early to help set up for church BBQ lunch, Ashley went with. New minister preached, voted in. Paul and Andrea got Dillan a Nerf gun for his birthday. Walmart to let Dillan pick out a new bike. Kids swam. Dillan went to Gabe’s, came back home with him. Stormed. Toy Story 2.

item.title: Status Update – December 23, 2018
item.description: Church, kids sang in Christmas program. Went to grocery store with Ashley and Bruce. Kids played outside. Paul and Andrea came over, had gifts for kids, ate dinner with us. Watched couple of movies. Lesa play Monopoly with Dillan; Ashley and I played Crazy 8s, Old Maids, and Uno.

item.title: Status Update – December 22, 2018
item.description: Kids woke us screaming 3 days ’til Christmas. Busted butt cleaning house for Paul and Andrea visit, made kids clean their rooms, wrong day! Tablets. Outside time too. Lesa made big gingerbread house with kids. Watched Christmas shows, popcorn, lemonade. Worked on kids’ genealogy.

item.title: Status Update – December 2, 2018
item.description: Family Sunday. Lesa left after Sunday School, went to Nashville with Andrea and Bobbi. The kids and me went to Bloomington, got brake pads, McDonald’s, haircuts, remaining PAVA pics. Bruce and Ashley sick, Bruce running fever, movie time. Fixed Lesa’s brakes, mine needs calipers.
